
```{r, packages}
pkgs = c('plyr', 'dplyr','stringr','reshape2','tibble', 'data.table', 'DT')
for(pkg in pkgs){
    library(pkg, quietly=TRUE, verbose=FALSE, warn.conflicts=FALSE, 
            character.only=TRUE)
}
```

```{r}
load("../Rdata/lpd_precalc.Rdata")
```

Concentration {data-navmenu="Class"}
============================

```{r}
edata_list$class$Concentration %>%
    t %>% as.data.frame %>%
    datatable(
        extensions = 'Buttons',
        options = list(
            dom = "Bfrtip",
            pageLength = 40,
            bottons = c("copy","csv","excel")
        )
    ) %>%
    formatRound(columns = rownames(edata_list$class$Concentration),
                digits = 3)
```
